title: Between the Scenes - President Trump's "Loco" Press Conference
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - President Trump's "Loco" Press Conference
description:
Trevor marvels at President Trump's ability to tap into a Mexican persona at a press conference during which Trump called the media "loco."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
